Test Name: Beta FSH (Follicle Stimulating Hormone, beta subunit) Immunohistochemical Stain
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue or 4-5 Âµm sections on positively charged slides
Purpose: To detect and localize Beta FSH in tissue sections, assisting in the diagnosis of conditions such as pituitary tumors.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged glass slide
